key.name: slots
key.summary: Pinned items in slots, with copy options and favorite status.
key.description: This structure contains an array of items, where each item is an array with three elements: a string (first item), a path to an image (second item), and a favorite indicator (third item).

key.name: show-welcome-window
key.summary: Option to display the welcome window.
key.description: This key determines whether the welcome window is shown upon startup. The default value is set to true.

key.name: auto-arrange
key.summary: Option to auto arrange slots on change it.

key.name: alert-window-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of the copy alert window.
key.description: The opacity of the copy alert window, from 0 to 100. 0 is completely transparent, 100 is completely opaque.
